Sending conditions:Sent to a seller who has purchased an accurate valuation of their item (vehicle) when the valuation is returned from 3rd party service.
Sent at Monday 9am to anyone with a live advert which has not already been booked into a print product and is within the print location group.

Sending conditions:Sent on Monday at 9am to sellers who match these conditions: Advert was published in previous print edition Advert is still live Advert print product has expired before the next edition

Sending conditions:Sent to a seller who has not reached a defined number of views to their advert within 72(X) hours of it going live (or within 72(X) hours of it being posted again after expiring).This number of views is definable in admin per category. Sent 72(X) hours after advert posted.

Sending conditions:Sent to a seller who has not reached a defined number of enquiries about their advert within 72(X) hours of it going live (or within 72(X) hours of it being posted again after expiring). This number of enquiries is definable in admin per category.Sent 72(X) hours after advert posted.
